title: Rise - A Top Down Multiplayer Shooter
description: Rise - A Top Down Multiplayer Shooter is exactly that. This top down multiplayer template is 100% blueprint based utilizing weapon drop and pickup functionality.
longDescription:
I couldn't find a top down shooter that was multiplayer, so I had to create one. This is a great reference for adding multiplayer to your own game. Includes CommonUI blueprints so you can get an idea as to how to utilize that as well. I will be using this template as a base for my own game as well so I will be updating this with new features. It is network replicated.


Trailer/Gameplay - Youtube link | Version 2.0 Trailer/Gameplay - Youtube link

DEMO V1.5 Link | DEMO V2.0 Link


Update 2.0 for UE5.4 Highlights:

·        Reworked game system

·        Added use of Data Assets and Tables for weapons and characters

·        Implemented Inventory system

·        Removed Elven Ruins Content to save space


Please make a copy of your older project before updating to a newer version.

 

Disclaimer: For demonstration purposes, this product uses free assets from Epic Games; specifically, "Lyra" (Lyra Starter Game in UE Game Samples - UE Marketplace (epicgames.com)), "Infinity Blade" (Infinity Blade: Grass Lands in Epic Content - UE Marketplace (epicgames.com)) (Version 2.0 and up of this asset no longer use this).

Disclaimer: “ModelingToolsEditorMode” and “CommonUI” need to be enabled to run this project

Disclaimer: Set your Viewport class to CommonGameViewportClient if integrating to another project.

Disclaimer: This product supports Lumen for Unreal Engine 5.0+

Disclaimer: System currently only works for actors with the tag “Player”.

Disclaimer: If integrating, you need to create “Interaction” trace channel in your new project
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Network replicated functionality (multiplayer support)
  • 100% blueprint (no C++)
  • Implemented Inventory system
  • Uses Data Assets and Data Tables for weapons and characters
  • Controls utilizing the new Enhanced Inputs
  • A basic CommonUI menu (which means gamepad support)
  • Weapon drop and pickup functionality
  • Limited Casting for performance purposes (only cast on begin play)
  • Layered Animation Blueprint (confirm what it's called in blueprints.) (Used to easily switch between weapon types
  • Metasounds (gone are the days of sound cues, this template provides basic use of metasounds for those no longer wishing to use sound cues)
  • Footstep FX (footstep audio, dust, and footprints
  • FootIK (foot placement)
  • Supports different weapon types
  • Basic melee AI using behavior tree
  • Basic Shooting AI with Patrol route
  • Ragdoll physics on death
  • Realistic ammo for magazines (you can change this to your own setup if desired [currently, if you reload you lose the ammo that was left in the magazine]
  • Player Rotates to Mouse position functionality
  • Basic Scoring system


Number of Blueprints: 111

Input: (Gamepad, Mouse & Keyboard)

Network Replicated: (Yes)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Not Sure

Documentation: Documentation Link

Discord: https://discord.gg/46NyGj3x74
